attributes.value: Finds eloquence and artful speech off-putting
Values decorum, dignity and proper behavior
Dislikes cooperation
Believes it is important to conceal emotions and refrain from complaining
Has a great deal of respect for worthy craftsmanship
Sees sacrifice as wasteful and foolish
Respects perseverance
Sees war as a useful means to an end
Values knowledge
Can easily fall in love or develop positive sentiments
Is dour as a rule
Is brave in the face of imminent danger
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Takes no pleasure in her talents and appearance
Is generally unhindered by the thoughts of others concerning her actions
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Is sloppy with her living space
Sees others as selfish and conniving
Would never under any circumstances speak up or otherwise put forth her point of view in a discussion
Totally clumsy
Susceptible to disease
A good intellect
A boundless creative imagination
A meager ability with social relationships
